expo.name: CoinPilot
expo.description: Learn cryptocurrency trading with virtual money in a completely risk-free simulation environment. Practice trading strategies, track portfolio performance, and compete with other traders - all without using real money. Perfect for beginners learning crypto trading fundamentals.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Camera access is used to scan QR codes for joining trading collections and sharing invite codes.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Microphone access is used for voice commands in trading practice sessions.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera to scan QR codes for joining trading collections
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your microphone for voice commands in practice sessions
